headline: Data Center Low Voltage (LV) / Medium Voltage (MV) Power Distribution Business Report 2025: Market to Reach $3.3 Billion by 2030 ABB, Chatsworth, Cummins, CyberPower System, Delta Electronics Leading
summary: The key market opportunities in the Data Center LV/MV Power Distribution market focus on the rising demand for reliable and efficient systems due to the growth of cloud computing and AI. Innovations in AI-driven power analytics, modular power units, and DC power distribution enhance efficiency. Regulatory policies pushing for energy efficiency also present strategic growth avenues.
